participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and empathetic, Emily loves exploring the outdoors and caring for animals. She's open-minded and enjoys trying new things.
participant_1.background: i've brown curly hair. i like riding horses. my bedroom is purple and lime green. i am a vegan.

participant_2.name: Walter
participant_2.personality: Wise and spirited, Walter has a youthful heart and a zest for life. He enjoys reflecting on the past while embracing the present.
participant_2.background: i'm 100 years old. i'm very strong for my age. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.
